scripts.dev:local: mkdir -p dist && postcss -w src/index.css -u postcss-import -u postcss-custom-media -u postcss-custom-properties -u postcss-calc -u postcss-color-function -u postcss-remove-root -u autoprefixer -o dist/fn.css
scripts.build:transpile: mkdir -p dist && postcss src/index.css -u postcss-import -u postcss-custom-media -u postcss-custom-properties -u postcss-calc -u postcss-color-function -u postcss-remove-root -u autoprefixer -o dist/fn.css
scripts.build: npm run build:transpile && npm run build:minify
